description: Defines the SchedulingService class, which implements scheduling, listing, canceling, and retrieval of scheduled and published social media posts within a social media management platform.

classes.name: SchedulingService
classes.description: Service class responsible for scheduling, listing, canceling, and retrieving social media posts.

methods.name: ScheduleAsync
methods.description: Schedules a new social media post for a user and returns the created post DTO.

methods.name: ListScheduledAsync
methods.description: Retrieves a list of scheduled posts for a user, optionally filtered by social account.

methods.name: CancelAsync
methods.description: Cancels a scheduled post by updating its status to 'canceled'.

methods.name: ListPublishedAsync
methods.description: Retrieves a list of published posts for a user, optionally filtered by social account.
